name: source_sheet
Description: sheet, from which Plan data should be taken

name: PlanNamesTruncatedByBA
Description: Set 'yes' if you want the program to create plans with truncated names (max=60 chars), may be needed if you have more than 6 locales, but result is unpredictable

name: ResourceRateNamesTruncatedByOA
Description: Set 'yes' if you see that resource names were truncated by OA (max=64chars, usually in OA 6.x), the program will then search for truncated resource names

name: prefix
Description: plan name prefix, not needed so far
